_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Six qualities that can cause decline in: Being frustrated and not content with any kind of robes
Being frustrated and not content with any kind of almsfood
Being frustrated and not content with any kind of lodgings
Being frustrated and not content with any kind of medicines and supplies for the sick
Being faithless, unethical, unmindful, and witless
Six qualities that can cause growth in s: Being content with any kind of robes
Being content with any kind of almsfood
Being content with any kind of lodgings
Being content with any kind of medicines and supplies for the sick
Being faithful, ethical, mindful, and wise.
